body.name: Pamo Babe Playard Deluxe Nursery Center, Foldable Playpen for Baby & Toddler, Bassinet, Mattress, Changing Table for Newborn (Grey)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 18 hrs 33 mins
features: 4 in 1 Multi Function--Toddler playard for more room to play or sleep, infant bassinet, newborn bassinet and diaper changer for quick and easy diaper changes.
Easy to assemble--Beware of operation order!Firstly pull up four sides,secondly press down the bottom of the playpen
Easy to fold--Beware of operation order! Firstly pull up the drawstring of the bottom,secondly pull down the four sides of the playpen
Portable Carrying Bag--Convenient for parents to carry, your little one can also sleep and play in a familiar and comfortable playpens at anytime and anywhere
This play yard has breathable mesh for you to keep an eye on your baby and provide a steady flow of air for your baby

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ways to assemble and fold Please fold and assemble the playpen correctly How to fold? Firstly pull up the drawstring of the bottom,secondly pull down the four sides of the playpen How to assemble? Firstly pull up four sides,secondly press down the bottom of the playpen If one side can't be locked, please re-fold the playpen first, then try again to assemble the playpen correctly Customer Says Baby in 0-6 month The playard is also really easy to set up and use. It's foldable, which makes it easy to store when not in use, and the wheels make it easy to move around the room. The mattress is also really comfortable, which is great for babies and toddlers. Customer Says Baby in 12-18 month This is the perfect set for any new parents. It has everything you need for a baby. The changing station is so convenient. I like that I don't have to take my daughter to different rooms or parts of the room to nap or for a diaper change. It also folds up really easily. Pamo Babe 4 in 1 Deluxe Nursery Center Toddler Playard,Infant Bassinet,Newborn Bassinet,Diaper Changer This play yard has breathable mesh for you to keep an eye on your baby and provide a steady flow of air for your baby

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My granddaughter loves it
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my granddaughter’s baby. She loved it and said it was just what she wanted. I haven’t seen it in person yet, but she said it was easy to put together and it is well made and sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and solid bed! Very well made!
reviews.reviewText: Amazing 🤩 bed for my grand daughter! Very happy 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy and comfortable for baby
reviews.reviewText: Just a little tricky to put together. But once it is, you and baby will love it. The bassinet and diaper changer FIRMLY GRIP the sides. Once baby is crawling, they can be removed so you can use the playpen. Holds up to 35 pounds (others similar products hold up to 25 lbs.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Honestly its a great gift for a bby shower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile, Convenient, and Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the Pamo Babe Playard Deluxe Nursery Center, and I'm really happy with my purchase. The playard is incredibly versatile, with a bassinet, changing table, and playpen all in one. This makes it really convenient for parents, as you don't have to buy separate pieces of furniture for each function.The playard is also really easy to set up and use. It's foldable, which makes it easy to store when not in use, and the wheels make it easy to move around the room. The mattress is also really comfortable, which is great for babies and toddlers.Overall, I'm really happy with my purchase. The Pamo Babe Playard Deluxe Nursery Center is a great choice if you're looking for a versatile, easy-to-use playard that has everything you need for your baby or toddler. If you're a busy parent who wants to save space and money, this playard is definitely worth checking out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great play yard with lots of options! However, it is not as easy to assemble as shown. It takes two of us to open and lock it. It is also a little hard to hook things on the top. My daughter and I were able to do it, but my elderly mother would not be able to. Seems sturdy and is very sharp looking!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Is easy to built

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy assembly and good strong product
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with the purchase. First grandchild is about to visit. Little easier than the one I used 20 years ago. Much lighter and came with everything needed. Really happy with the price and quality. Took about 10 minutes to put together.
